message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broadly constructive session for mid/small caps. Momentum strong in PSU/infra (BHEL, NBCC, HUDCO), selective financials (ABCAPITAL, POLICYBZR), and defense (BEML). Some softness in telecom infra (INDUSTOWER) and select financials (SBICARD, UNIONBANK). Given our small-capital setup, bias is to buy strength on breakouts or pullbacks with tight risk. No emergency trades needed; prefer confirmation on Monday.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Wide-range up day, close near high with strong volume; momentum continuation if day’s high clears", "price": 329.00},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Buy on pullback", "reason": "Strong close near high with heavy volume; better risk/reward on shallow dip", "price": 257.00},
    {"symbol": "POLICYBZR", "signal": "Buy on continuation", "reason": "Bullish reversal and strong close; trigger on takeout of today’s high", "price": 1852.00},
    {"symbol": "IRCON", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Tight close just below resistance; breakout level nearby", "price": 175.50},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Mean-reversion buy", "reason": "Sharp intraday selloff into support; bounce setup if reclaims 98", "price": 98.20},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Closed near high with good volume; momentum continuation above day’s high", "price": 119.00},
    {"symbol": "BEML", "signal": "Buy on breakout retest", "reason": "Range expansion toward 2268 then cool-off; buy if highs are reclaimed", "price": 2270.00},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Coiling below resistance; continuation if 337 area is cleared", "price": 337.50},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on strength", "reason": "Near prior swing; add only if price pushes through today’s high", "price": 411.00}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 6942.20,
    "total_value": 26270.60,
    "holdings_count": 5,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2442.80)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ 266.26 (CMP 267.89)",
      "BEL: 10 units @ 412.80 (CMP 409.90)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ 900.05 (CMP 969.55)",
      "INDUSTOWER: 5 units @ 361.55 (CMP 368.25)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "PSU/infra momentum: BHEL, NBCC, HUDCO strong; prefer staggered entries on minor dips or breakout confirmations.",
    "Rail PSUs coiling: RVNL and IRCON sitting just under resistance; watch for volume-backed breakouts.",
    "Financials: ABCAPITAL strong momentum; POLICYBZR showed a powerful reversal; LTF neutral-to-positive, keep holding.",
    "Telecom infra: INDUSTOWER printed O=H and sold off intraday; key support 364–365. Manage risk if this zone breaks.",
    "Healthcare: LAURUSLABS momentum day; use a trailing stop to protect gains. LUPIN steady.",
    "Defense/Capital goods: BEML range expansion; HAL flat-to-soft; BEL constructive—look to add only on strength.",
    "Caution list (avoid until strength returns): UNIONBANK, SBICARD, AEGISLOG (weak close), AMBER (distribution-type day).",
    "Low/odd liquidity flags: PEL had zero volume; IDEA extremely thin—exclude from trade plans.",
    "Risk guardrails for current holdings (monitor on gap-downs): INDUSTOWER < 362 risk-off, BEL < 398 risk-off, LTF < 261 risk-off, LAURUSLABS < 950 trail stop, BSE < 2408 trail stop.",
    "Position sizing for Monday: favor affordable setups for our cash—IDBI (~98) 40–60 shares on trigger; ABCAPITAL (~329) 10–15 shares on breakout; NBCC (~119) 20–30 shares if strength persists."
  ]
}
